attributes.additional_details: £94 per week is not enough for the normal working class person to live off, if for this instance in a pandemic regarding the corona virus, people are being urged to go into self isolation for health etc but the normal person cant afford to do so...
attributes.background: Increase the Statutory Sick Pay in balance with the average working wage

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
